com.core.adnsdk

Interface AdListener

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    AdListenerAdapter

    public interface AdListener
    The listener of AdView. User can use default adapter design pattern of AdListener like AdListenerAdapter. Therefore, user can focus on specific events they care about.
    Since:
    2015-07-23

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void onAdClicked()
      Ad is clicked.
      void onAdFinished()
      If ad was clicked, and User back to app, this callback would be called.
      void onAdImpressed()
      Ad is impressed.
      void onAdLoaded(AdObject adObject)
      Ad is loaded.
      void onAdReleased()
      Ad is released.
      boolean onAdWatched()
      User can determine whether load another ad when current ad was watched using return value.
      void onError(ErrorMessage err)
      Ad has error.

    • Method Detail

      • onAdLoaded

        void onAdLoaded(AdObject adObject)
        Ad is loaded.
        Parameters:
        adObject -

      • onError

        void onError(ErrorMessage err)
        Ad has error.
        Parameters:
        err -

      • onAdClicked

        void onAdClicked()
        Ad is clicked.

      • onAdFinished

        void onAdFinished()
        If ad was clicked, and User back to app, this callback would be called.

      • onAdReleased

        void onAdReleased()
        Ad is released.

      • onAdWatched

        boolean onAdWatched()
        User can determine whether load another ad when current ad was watched using return value. Banners are always load another ad when current ad was watched.
        Returns:
        It would load another ad when current ad was watched if user return true.

      • onAdImpressed

        void onAdImpressed()
        Ad is impressed.
